name: Super Rich
description:
This is a funny casual game, just opening it on your desktop then you will get many many bills fall from the sky! Fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds! Support many editing options

Main features

  • Interactive simulation - react to the mouse movement
  • Many editing options - you can change almost every effect.
  • Game Mode - will pause when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Optimized code created for mobile devices.
  • Multi-Language
